originalText.text: A few weeks ago, my Elmhurst home had a pretty bad water leak that came from the upstairs’ bathroom and got all the way to the kitchen and one of the bedrooms. Not only did it leave big water marks all over the place, but mold started growing from all the humidity that was building up. I searched for companies online and Rainbow was the first one to answer, they came in right way to inspect my house and made sure to start the restoration process ASAP. They had technicians set up their equipment and do readings in all affected rooms and what surprised me was the quickness and efficiency in which they left both my kitchen and bathroom fixed, as well as the bedroom! It all got restored within the same day and I didn’t have to worry anymore about mold growing inside, such a life saver, thank you.

originalText.text: I was away on vacation for about 2 weeks last winter. There was a big rainstorm in New York. When I arrived home, my front deck was severely damaged from a combination of a defective pipe and a rainstorm. A friend recommended Rainbow International of Maspeth. They came WITHIN AN HOUR and stayed in our house until 9pm, removing the damaged panels, restoring, and polishing. I cannot tell you how happy I was with their service. Absolutely the most professional team. They went above and beyond!

originalText.text: We came home from vacation to find the bedroom of our condo severely damaged from a leak in the roof. Water had come in from a leak in the roof and affected the walls and our hardwood floors. Rainbow removed and replaced the damaged flooring and drywall and did so in excellent fashion! The Rainbow team made this nightmare manageable and we were happy with how the room turned out after completion.

originalText.text: I'm not a review writer kinda guy but need to give a big shoutout to rainbow maspeth for their incredible work rebuilding my basement. after a steam valve on my radiator burst, my entire house got flooded. they went over each section of the house with me, meticulously taking notes on how things were before and how best to restore it. the end result ended up even better than i imagined.

text.text: I'm not a review writer kinda guy but need to give a big shoutout to rainbow maspeth for their incredible work rebuilding my basement. after a steam valve on my radiator burst, my entire house got flooded. they went over each section of the house with me, meticulously taking notes on how things were before and how best to restore it. the end result ended up even better than i imagined.

originalText.text: Speedy and responsive, after heavy rains caused 2 feet of water to rush into my basement, rainbow maspeth arrived in less than 90 minutes and started pumping water out. within 4 hours of me calling, my basement was fully pumped with dehumidifiers and fans set up.
